DOC.criteria: Aged 1419 year Sexually active male past three month Presenting ED reproductive health complaint . Presently pregnant Too ill participation per attend physician Cognitively impair In foster care ward state Does speak English Spanish Does cellular mobile phone text messaging capability Used contraception last intercourse and/or currently use `` highly effective '' `` effective '' form contraception ( defined World Health Organization ) Does live Manhattan Bronx
